title: Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms Interview, Presidential Bet, Shirley's Crockpot and more.
itunes:title: Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms Interview, Presidential Bet, Shirley's Crockpot and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today is the day that the Lord has made, let us rejoice and be glad in it. He invites you to do the same. The Chief Love Officer pulls an emasculated man to the side to build him back up. Cardi B. claps back for being called President-elect Joe Biden's pawn. The Mayor of Atlanta stopped by to discuss the Biden/Harris victory, The Georgia Runoff and voting. Our boy from Dallas points out what Trump got away with and what he truly wanted to be. We also get a specific message from Jacksonville, FL. Did you know a winning bet was placed on the presidency that is on pause until January? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve does something completely different and brings us back with a throwback that will give us a flashback! The Top 10!!! Btw, he talks about his kids.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today is the day that the Lord has made, let us rejoice and be glad in it. He invites you to do the same. The Chief Love Officer pulls an emasculated man to the side to build him back up. Cardi B. claps back for being called President-elect Joe Biden's pawn. The Mayor of Atlanta stopped by to discuss the Biden/Harris victory, The Georgia Runoff and voting. Our boy from Dallas points out what Trump got away with and what he truly wanted to be. We also get a specific message from Jacksonville, FL. Did you know a winning bet was placed on the presidency that is on pause until January?
